snippet: Thousands of motorists may be driving cars and trucks with dangerous counterfeit air bags and should have them replaced at their own expense, the Obama administration warned.
abstract: Obama administration warns that thousands of motorists may be driving cars and trucks with dangerous counterfeit air bags and that they should have them replaced at their own expense.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of motorists may be driving cars and trucks with dangerous counterfeit air bags and should have them replaced at their own expense, the Obama administration warned.

headline.main: Motorists Are Warned About Counterfeit Air Bags
headline.print_headline: Motorists Are Warned About Counterfeit Air Bags
